about_the_game:
This DLC offers two books to accompany the video game Superfluous Returnz: an artbook and the game's “prequel” comic book!

Both books are supplied in PDF format, in English and French versions.

Superfluous Returnz Artbook



This book presents the graphics created for the “Superfluous Returnz” video game. You'll find every location, every character, every cutscene, every animation detailed frame by frame, and much more. All with commentary by the author, in English and French!

The printed version (not provided by this DLC) is available on Lulu and Amazon.

The Unnecessary Adventures of Superfluous

Discover the comic book where it all began!



Once again, it’s the story of a billionaire who wants to fight crime, masked, with the help of his faithful butler... Yes, but this billionaire lives in a peaceful village of 350 souls, and his “butler” is a carer sent by the employment agency.

Discover the unnecessary adventures of Superfluous, the useless superhero.

The printed version (not provided by this DLC) is available on Lulu and Amazon.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC creates a folder with PDF files into the game's installation directory (folder {STEAM_ROOT}/steamapps/common/superfluous-returnz/).

  • Additional Notes: This DLC creates a folder with PDF files into the game's installation directory (folder {STEAM_ROOT}/steamapps/common/superfluous-returnz/).
